message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the exclusive opportunity to acquire this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I believe this represents a fair starting point for negotiations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. My counteroffer would be $1,200,000.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I believe the value of this product is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000. This is my final offer for this round.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am willing to go up to $1,250,000.
